data.title: Christopher Reid, M.D. – Healthy Foundations Group
data.text:
[column width=”1/3″ title=”” title_type=”single” animation=”none” implicit=”true”] [/column] [column width=”2/3″ last=”true” title=”Adult Psychiatrist” title_type=”no-divider” animation=”none” implicit=”true”] [contact_info name=”” color=”accent2″ phone=”” cellphone=”” email=”” address=””] [/contact_info] [/column] [divider type=”1″] [/divider] [column width=”2/3″ last=”true” title=”” title_type=”single” animation=”none” implicit=”true”]

Christopher T. Reid, MD is a psychiatrist trained in both therapy and psychopharmacology. His focus is on helping individuals achieve a better understanding of themselves through therapy. For persons who are unsure if medication is right for them, Dr. Reid offers a safe and open environment to discuss their use. Dr. Reid has experience treating patients with a wide range of concerns. He holds a special interest in the treatment of anxiety, depression and associated mood disorders, grief, difficulties with peer and family relationships and self-esteem.

Dr. Reid received his Bachelors of Science in Psychology from The Pennsylvania State University and obtained his Doctorate in Medicine from the St. George’s University School of Medicine. He completed his General Adult Psychiatry residency at the University of Maryland/Sheppard Pratt.

How to Contact Me:

*In the case of an emergency, I can be reached by phone at any time, day or night.

Phone: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm, (301) 970-4001

Portal: I will respond within 2 business days

Email: To protect patient privacy, per our practice policy, I do not use email with current or prospective clients.

[/column] [blank h=”30″]
